sourcesContent: import React, { Fragment, useContext } from 'react' import CartIcon from '../../Cart/CartIcon' import classes from './HeaderCartButton.module.css' import CartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' const HeaderCartButton = (props) => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext); const numberOfCartItems = cartCtx.items.reduce((curNumber, item) => { return (curNumber + item.amount) }, 0); const btnClassses = `${classes.button} ${classes.bump}` return ( ) } export default HeaderCartButton
